creator: Zzoo
descriptionHtml:
A world where cute animal friends live,
Idle healing game 「Healing Pocket」 that you can enjoy comfortably

Decorate your pockets and invite your friends to play with them!
Collect various pockets and interiors with hearts from your friends.

■ How to play
- Decorate your pockets
- Invite your friends and wait
- Make memories with friends

■ Recommended For People Who
- Like cute animal characters
- Want to decorate their own space
- Want to enjoy slow-paced game

Friends will come and go freely in the Healing Pocket.
Wait patiently for your friends and always treat them with your affection.
Your animal friends will also treat you with their affaction.

※ Note : Data will not be saved if the game is deleted.

# Minimum Specs
Android 5.0 or Above

# Customer Support
e-mail : contact@zzoozzoo.net

# App Permission
* This app requires certain permissions to provide the following functions.
- Allow reading device status for access check (READ_PHONE_STATE)
- Allow access to shared storage space (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE)
- Allow saving changes to shared storage space (WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE)
※ You can use the app even if you do not agree to the optional access right.

# Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
- Terms of Service : https://www.zzoozzoo.net/termsofservice.html
- Privacy Policy : https://www.zzoozzoo.net/privacy.html
※ Please note Healing Pocket is free to download and play, but some game items can be purchased for real money.

# Developer Info
152, Teheran-ro, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea
descriptionShort: Decorate your own healing pockets. And meet some cute animal friends!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Launched Healing Pocket!
Idle healing game 「Healing Pocket」 that you can enjoy comfortably
Fix minor Bug
